name: Evan's Remains (Demo)
description:
Evan, the genius boy, has been missing for years. One day, a letter signed by him is received, revealing he's in an uninhabited island in the Pacific.   Dysis, a young girl, goes to look for him. 

 

But as she goes into this mysterious island, she starts to get more questions than answers. Somehow, it seems everything is connected. 

Find the truth. Find Evan.

Evan's Remains is a puzzle platformer with visual novel elements that tells a story full of mystery and emotion. Solve puzzles and follow Dysis on her journey. 

(Only available for Windows at the moment. Mac OS coming soon!)

  • Variety of puzzles.
  • Well-maintained difficulty curve.
  • Deep characters.
  • Intriguing story with visual novel narrative. 
  • Charming pixel-art and music.  
Be part of the community! 

Hi there! My name is Matías Schmied and I'm the developer of Evan's Remains. If you enjoyed the demo and would like to see the full game someday, please follow me on my networks and be part of the fan community on Discord.

I'm developing the game by myself, so it would really help me to have a bunch of people that believe and support the game's potential. 

We can get to know each other, exchange feedback, and follow the development!

With your help, we could make this a reality.
